TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because cheese is tasty.

Why can't we all talk in Doge memes?

Because humans are more like cats than dogs, so the behavioural inclination of humanity is more to Lolcatz.

Gamma rays are bad and will extincktify us

Gamma Rays are made of high energy photons

Light is made of low energy photons

Therefore Gamma Rays-Energy=light

We must suck the energy out of the Gamma Rays

What sucks the energy out of stuff?

Nagging housewives suck the energy out of things!

Therefore, to turn gamma rays into pretty non-exckstinktifying light, all we need is a wall of nagging housewives!

So my question is this:

Given how many nagging housewives there are in America, why are americans worried about nukes and Gamma Rays at all?

Because of the neutron radiation.

Why doesn't CKAN store the version of a mod in the GameData folder?

Because AIDS is more powerful than Trump will ever be.

Why didn't mars collide with saturn yesterday?

8 hours ago, SAS123 said:

Why didn't mars collide with saturn yesterday?

Because you [did not] request the collision sufficient politeness.

What thought do you think was in the mind of the person when he named your galaxy the milky way?

Edited June 28, 2016 by PB666

Turrets.

Why do airplanes need wings if they can just use the seat bottom cusions to float?

Not all planes are seaplanes.

Why do we want to fly if we are not birds?

Because birds are awesome.

How many Kerbals does it take to change a light bulb in zero G?

Edited June 28, 2016 by kiwi1960

2, although if one of them accidentally finds a box of Snacks instead of a fresh lightbulb they'll forget about it for a whole day.

Why did everyone leave Venus?

10 hours ago, cubinator said:

2, although if one of them accidentally finds a box of Snacks instead of a fresh lightbulb they'll forget about it for a whole day.

Why did everyone leave Venus?

They had a referendum, the Leavers win. 

Do i need to ask a question?

Only if you want a response.

Why do we park in a driveway and drive on the parkway?

What's a parkway? Isn't that a British parking ramp?

Who is  King Cnidarian?

A jellyfish with crown & scepter

Why are there no ac-batteries ?

We'd have to redesign EVERYTHING, silly!

Is Jupiter buoyant?

Yeah, it rises even over the ocean.

Where do socks go during an economic crisis?

To Wonderland.

 

If nagging housewives are energy absorbant, can they extinguish the sun?

They'd chase the sun away before it went out

Can we use that on the kraken ?

God, please let yes be the answer!

 

Why must the rice grow?

So it doesn't have to walk.

Why do planes beep all the time?

Because they dont like to bop.

how do i sleep?

That's easy. Spell s-l-e-e-p. In that order.

 

What are thyroids?

The place where the body stores radioactivity, just in case it needs it. 

How much chalk could a chalk chalker chalk if a chalk chalker could chalk chalk?

10 chalky Newtonian chalks after Newton chalks on a chalky blackboard.

At what age can I get my fake I.D?

Any prime number.

8?

8 is the number following 9 and preceeding 7.

My IQ 79. What can do to become smarterer?
